No. 94547)} Sub: Revision of Deputation (Duty) Allowance and Special Allowance for Child Care for Women with disabilities on increase of Dearness Allowance to 50% reg: Consequent upon increase of Dearness Allowance to 50% W.e.f. 01.01.2024, it has been decided to increase the   following   allowances being followed by NHAI by 25%  W.e.f. 01.01.2024, as per instructions of the Central Government: (a) Deputation (Duty) Allowance (within the same station) 5% of Basic subject to maximum of Rs.5,625 per month: (b) Deputation (Duty) Allowance (involving change of station) 10% of Basic subject to maximum of Rs.11,250 per month: (c) Special Allowance for Child Care for Women with disabilities Rs.3,750 per month. 2 All Cadre Controlling Divisions are requested to take appropriate action in the matter. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 0824 (CS.
